name: Unity Pong MVP
description:
Description:
This is a simple example of how one could implement a minimal viable product for the well known PONG game in Unity. It is fully documented including in scene 'post-it' on GameObjects and source code comments. The GitHub repo also clearly shows in which order things were created and contains a readme.txt with some more info.

Controls:
Player 1: Q & A
Player 2: O & L
